name: Feathers
description: $FEATHERS is a community driven fan memecoin inspired by the iconic silent villain Feathers McGraw from the British classic Wallace & Gromit. The project aims to create a space where fans can come together to share their love for the character through memes, GIFs, and fan art. The community celebrates Feathers across social platforms like X, spreading his unique lore and charm while fostering creativity and engagement among supporters.
